tool.name: BaselineFilter
tool.description: Removes the baseline from profile spectra using a top-hat filter.
tool.command:
BaselineFilter
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_struc_elem_length: -struc_elem_length $param_struc_elem_length #end if #if $param_struc_elem_unit: -struc_elem_unit #if " " in str($param_struc_elem_unit): "$param_struc_elem_unit" #else $param_struc_elem_unit #end if #end if #if $param_method: -method #if " " in str($param_method): "$param_method" #else $param_method #end if #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_struc_elem_length
param.label: Length of the structuring element (should be wider than maximal peak width - see documentation)

param.name: param_method
param.label: The name of the morphological filter to be applied
param.help: (-method) If you are unsure, use the default

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Removes the baseline from profile spectra using a top-hat filter.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_BaselineFilter.html
